scripts.deploy: @echo off && echo [1/7] Creating tarball... && tar -cvzf deploy.tar.gz --exclude='.git' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='.env' --exclude='.vscode' --exclude='.log' . && echo [2/7] Transferring to droplet... && scp -v deploy.tar.gz root@159.223.191.120:/tmp/ && echo [3/7] Removing old files... && ssh root@159.223.191.120 'cd /var/www/payment-manager && rm -rf ./' && echo [4/7] Extracting files... && ssh root@159.223.191.120 'tar -xvzf /tmp/deploy.tar.gz -C /var/www/payment-manager' && echo [5/7] Installing dependencies... && ssh root@159.223.191.120 'cd /var/www/payment-manager && npm install --production' && echo [6/7] Running migrations... && ssh root@159.223.191.120 'cd /var/www/payment-manager && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && echo [7/7] Restarting PM2... && ssh root@159.223.191.120 'pm2 restart payment-manager' && echo Cleaning up... && del deploy.tar.gz && echo Deployment successful! || (echo Deployment failed! && exit 1)
scripts.updatePrisma: npx prisma db pull && npx prisma generate
